name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Dreamy - Anime HD New Tab Sharing App

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Fill your new tab with stunning HD scenery from anime and games. Share your photos and videos with the community.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Looking for a stunning HD anime new tab? Dreamy populates your new tab with a feed of beautiful HD photos and videos from shared by users from across our platform. Taking a couple seconds to appreciate this new tab will be sure to spark joy for you everyday!

Choose from a variety of options to make your new tab page truly your own. Follow your favorite accounts or upload your own content to build your own following. Invite your friends to join the fun. You can also like any photo and video to bookmark them.

Our initial creators focused on anime and gaming. You can enjoy these amazing photos and videos or find and upload something else that interests you in our growing community, whether itâ€™s travel photos, cityscapes, food, sports teams, or anything else.

Features:

- The most beautiful HD photos and videos
- Follow your favorite accounts to customize your feed
- Upload your own photos or videos either publicly for the community or privately for yourself
- A quickly growing community of contributors
- A fresh inspirational quote to bring positivity to your day
- Greeting and time display
- Google search bar
